column5: About 8 years ago my dad bought a utility trailer for the pond hopper. At the time he had the choice of that, or for $100 more a boat trailer that accomodated up to 14' He cheaped out unfortunately, but I think the boat trailer was on for $500 or something like that.  Is there anywhere I can get a 14' boat trailer for a decent price?
PM Cliff (ccmt), I believe he got a pretty nice new one for a reasonable price Rich!
